reference_summary:
AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist
{'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.  See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'}
This is pretty good.  I was surprised at how well it worked for detangling wet hair.  The scent is also nice -- it does not smell like vinegar.  It does help with frizziness, too, on those really humid days.  It also reduces static electricity in your hair on really dry days.  I would definitely use this again.
Detangles Well
Taya Beauty Buriti Nut Intensive Repair Shampoo & Conditioner Duo – Organic Hydrating Shampoo and Conditioner for Dry Damaged Hair - Restorative Hair Care – Travel Size 2 fl oz
TAYA I AM.
{'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'All, Dull, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '5.25 x 3.5 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '858308002635'}
This shampoo and conditioner set is very moisturizing, but doesn't leave your hair limp or greasy-looking.  It leaves my fine, shoulder-length hair bouncy and shiny.  The travel size is also very convenient.
Nice
2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands
MEETWIN
{}
I like the twist towel a lot, but I found the shower-cap-like towel to be a little hard to use.  My hair is below shoulder-length, and it just didn't work well for me.  The twist towel is great, though.  I didn't care for the hair ties and won't be using those.  If you have longer hair and just want some twist towels, I would go with a different product because the cap probably won't work for you.  But if you're hair is shorter, this set would be a pretty good choice.
Okay
Lavender Fields Sugar Polish by South of France Clean Body Care | Moisturizing Sugar Scrub for Women | Shea Butter + Sunflower Oil | 8 oz Tube
South of France Natural Body Care
{'Brand': 'South of France Natural Body Care', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lavender', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '20.3 x 7.1 x 5.1 inches; 8.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '856885005155'}
This body polish is very good at exfoliating, but not as moisturizing as I would like.  It smells nice, although the scent seems to be fake and not real lavender.  It's still a nice scent, though.  I would get this again if I found a good deal, but there are others that I like better.
Good Exfoliation
Microfiber Hair Towel Two Layers Turban Wrap YANJIE Super Absorbent Shower Head Towel Hair Caps with 2 Buttons,Quick Dryer Hat,Bathing Wrapped Cap for Women Girls Mom Daughter(Blue&Purple)
YanJie
{'Package Dimensions': '12.2 x 7.4 x 3.11 inches; 10.58 Ounces'}
I've become addicted to these hair towels because they're so convenient and effective.  Regular towels are kind of heavy on your head.  These are perfect.  They're very soft, just the right size, and do a great job of soaking the water out of your hair.
Great for Wrapping Wet Hair
Maya Mari -  Castor Oil Shampoo for Women, Strengthening and Moisturizing Shampoo for Coarse, Textured, and Curly Hair, 32 oz
MAYA MARI
{'Brand': 'MAYA MARI', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged Hair,Curly Hair', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 8 x 11 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MMCACCSP', 'UPC': '850004068229', 'Manufacturer': 'HGI Brands'}
This shampoo does an excellent job of moisturizing (and cleaning) your hair.  However, you don't want to use it more than 3-4 times a week, because the castor oil builds up and starts making your hair look greasy.  I alternate it with another shampoo, and it works great that way.
Very Moisturizing
Think Nature Orange Blossom Shampoo, No Sulfate Paraben, All hair types16.9fl.oz(500ml)
think nature
{'Brand': 'Think nature', 'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Hair Type': 'All Hair Types16.9fl.oz,All Hair Types', 'Scent': 'Citrus,Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.7 x 7.8 inches; 1.06 Pounds'}
This did a great job of leaving my hair moisturized without being greasy, and also leaving it shiny and bouncy.  I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's not as good as some of the products I use that have coconut oil.  Nevertheless, it's a good product and worth a try.
Very Good
Hair Drying Towels, METLUCK 3 Pack Hair Wrap Towels Super Absorbent Microfiber Hair Towel with Button Design to Dry Hair Quickly (Gray/Brown/Stripe)
METLUCK
{'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 9.45 x 3.15 inches; 9.38 Ounces'}
I've become addicted to these hair towels because they're so convenient and effective. Regular towels are kind of heavy on your head. These are perfect. They're very soft, just the right size, and do a great job of soaking the water out of your hair.  They won't get your hair completely dry, but they will absorb a lot of water and leave your hair so that it's wet but not dripping wet.
Nice Hair Towels

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize effective hair care solutions with a focus on hydration and restorative properties. Their recent acquisition of a microfiber towel set underscores their commitment to practical, high-quality tools that promote hair care while enhancing comfort.

- **Brand Affinity:** While maintaining loyalty to brands that emphasize organic and natural ingredients, the user remains open to exploring new brands, as their recent purchase reflects a positive experience with a lesser-known brand.

- **Performance Focus:** High-performing products that enhance shine and combat dryness are still paramount for the user. They appreciate multifunctional items that support hydration without weighing hair down, evident in their satisfaction with the latest towels focused on absorbency and softness.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** The user prefers mild and pleasant fragrances, particularly citrus notes, guiding their choices in product selection.

- **Repurchase Likelihood:** Their enthusiasm for versatile hydration-focused items indicates a strong likelihood of repurchasing products that contribute to overall hair health.

- **Skin Care Interest:** The user's holistic self-care journey is expanding, with increased attention to body care products, indicating a comprehensive approach to personal care that transcends hair.

The user maintains a consistent emphasis on natural, effective, and sensory-pleasing products tailored to their specific needs, aligning seamlessly with their holistic beauty philosophy.
